enchant_revised.configuration.title: Enchanting Revised Configuration
Removes vanilla XP from the game.

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableBott:
Should the Bottle O' Enchanting be available in loot tables? Existing bottles are unaffected.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableEnch:
Enable the Enchanting Altar recipe?

(Server only. Reload required.)

Enable the vanilla Enchanting Table recipe?

(Server only. Reload required.)

Should the vanilla Enchanting Table cost XP to use?

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableAnvi:
Should the Anvil cost XP to use?

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableBook:
Should the Anvil increase the level of Enchanted Books when two of the same level are combined (vanilla behaviour)?

Turning this on will make high level enchantments too easy to acquire through the Enchanting Altar.

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.replaceMen:
Replace the Mending enchantment with a repair-over-time effect.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.repairDela:
Delay in ticks before 1 durability is repaired.

(Server only.)

Repair Delay is reduced by this many ticks for each level of Mending above 1.

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableEcho:
Add Echoing Book trade to librarians.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableLapi:
Add Lapis Lazuli trade to librarians.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableEnch:
Should vanilla Enchanted Books be available to trade from librarians?

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.repairNeth:
Repair netherite armor and tools with diamonds.

(Server only.)

Repair netherite armor and tools with netherite scrap.

(Server only.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableReci: Show the recipe book button for the Enchanting Altar?
enchant_revised.configuration.enableXPBa: Should the vanilla XP bar be shown on the UI?
Change the height of the health, armour, and food bars on the GUI.

Recommended: 39 if XP bar is shown, 33 if it's hidden.
